message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident that you'll find it meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1500000 on this purchase. I would like to make a counteroffer at $1450000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000 for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this incredible product.
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value you place on the product, I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1600000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1800000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll counteroffer at $1700000.
I understand your position, Alice. I've been considering your offers carefully, and I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1650000.

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so I'll counteroffer at $1675000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident we can make it work.
